Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Add CLAUDE.md for Claude Code guidance

Provides repository overview, common commands, and architecture
documentation for Kubernetes-based Minecraft infrastructure.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Rename redis directory to dragonflydb

Renames pterodactyl/redis/ to pterodactyl/dragonflydb/ for clarity
since the directory contains DragonflyDB configuration.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Limit DragonflyDB to 2 threads to reduce memory requirement

DragonflyDB requires ~256MB per thread. The pod was crash-looping
because it detected 8 threads but only had 512Mi available \(needs 2Gi\).
Limiting to 2 threads allows it to run within 512Mi.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Increase DragonflyDB memory to 640Mi for overhead

512Mi was exactly the requirement for 2 threads but left no room
for container overhead, causing startup failure.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
